analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#436-457):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokens <= token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#450)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#451)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#436-457):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokens <= token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#450)
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#451-452)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#452-455)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#436-457) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#451-452)

Crowdsale.tokenResend (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#464-466) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0333a8c69858382840ea4980d5550fcc632342f0.sol#465-466)
